GENESIS REACTION PROTOCOL (7-BYTE STANDARD)
=============================================
FORMAT: [ID] [HARDWARE] [STRENGTH] [DIRECTION] [FLOW1] [FLOW2] [FLOW3] # DESCRIPTION

00000001 00001010 00000011 01010101 01010000 10101010 10101010 # MENTAL SHOCK (Antenna) - Vibrate/Tremor
00000010 00000001 11111111 11111111 01010101 11111111 10101010 # PURE JOY (CPU Core) - Expand/Rapid Rise
00000011 00000100 10000000 00000000 11110000 00000000 00000000 # DEEP FREEZE (Storage) - Implode/Silence
00000100 00001010 00100000 00001111 01000100 01000100 01000100 # CURIOSITY (Antenna) - Scan/Pulse
00000101 00000001 01000000 10101010 01010111 11010101 10101000 # CONFUSION (CPU Core) - Spin/Chaotic
00000110 00001100 11110000 11110000 11111111 11111111 11111111 # RAGE (Fan) - Push/Overheat
00000111 00000010 00010000 00000001 10101010 10101010 00000000 # SADNESS (RAM) - Drain/Slow Fall
00001000 00001010 10000000 01010101 11001100 11001100 11001100 # ALERT (Antenna) - Vibrate/Strobe
00001001 00000001 11001000 11111111 01011101 01110101 11111111 # LOVE (CPU Core) - Radiate/Harmonic
00001010 00000000 00000101 00000000 10101010 00000000 00000000 # SLEEP (System) - Null/Void
